title: Alpha Client Test
body: Just curious, I was a tester for the Alpha Client, and submitted one or two things for bugfixes when it was PBE only. Does this mean my main account will recieve the icon?

replies.body: Did you not get Alpha Client access for the live environment? A lot of the PBE testers ended up getting Alpha Access, so if you do have access, you should login before the 15th so you can get that dope icon!
I have to login on live. .. :( is such a large download.
Yes, it doesn't matter you reported the bugs, if you were on before november 15, you will get the reward.
but on my NA account? cause i only did it on my PBE
